comments: Everyone rags on wellinski for being a bad teacher. But he\'s a good guy and cares about his students. Encourages participation and is passionate about education.

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Respected (1)
comments: This guy is one of the best teachers I\'ve had and is probably one of the best in the state of Michigan. There should not be mandatory classes, just mandatory instructors and Dr. Wellinski (who we call Lewinsky) is one of them.

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Respected (1)
comments: If you want a professor that is interesting,funny, and adorable take this guy. The class is engaging and thought provoking. It really gets you about literacy and the current state of our educational system.

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Respected (1)
comments: He has great ideals and fresh perspectives. I\'m surprised there are this many bad reviews. Maybe he changed, but I loved this class and teacher. So much I left my first review on here! He was helpful, insightful, and most of all GENUINE.

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Prof W\'s style is not trad. He doesnt do direct-instruction per se w/ outlines & a PPT. His classroom style takes on an open disc. style w/ him as a participant. Discs are stud-dir., & Prof W guides the disc. Most studs arent used to do this style & it bothers them. Grades arent assigned in the usu manner; he relies on part. in the disc.

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Respected (1)
comments: This professor should be avoid if at all possible. During our class, he waited until the very end of the semester to hand back any grades, and he seemed to come to class unprepared to teach. It was as if he just showed up and started talking with no real thought about what he was going to say. He had all these plans, but never followed through.

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Absolutely horrendous. Shows up late and leaves early, will grade you down if you don\'t agree with him, expects perfection, frequently changes dates and times and is incredibly inflexible. Condescending and disrespectful to almost everyone. There is NO learning going on in his classroom.

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Where to begin? In the 24 years that I have been in and around education, he is the worst teacher I have ever encountered. His class is completely useless and his teaching style is terrible. His class is confusing and amazingly disorganized. He grades subjectively, has open book tests that have 10 questions, but cover 5-6 chapters at once! Avoid!!!

comments: It was pretty much the worse class I have ever taken, and I have been in some pretty bad ones. He should NOT be teaching at a University level, if at all.

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Mark my words-avoid @ all costs. You will learn nothing, take the hardest tests because you are not taught anything. Biggest waste of $ & time. I wish I never had this class with him. Believe me, You will regret it. It is not easy to get a good grade, but this class is crucial to further your career in education. Trust me, avoid him!
